  • Uses of SubstitutionMatrix in org.biojava.nbio.core.alignment.matrices

    Classes in org.biojava.nbio.core.alignment.matrices that implement SubstitutionMatrix
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ScaledSubstitutionMatrix
    The biojava-alignment module represents substitution matrices with short values.
    class 
    SimpleSubstitutionMatrix<C extends Compound>
    Implements a data structure which holds the score (penalty or bonus) given during alignment for the exchange of one Compound in a sequence for another.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SubstitutionMatrix<C>
    SubstitutionMatrix.normalizeMatrix(short scale)
    Rescales the matrix so that to getMaxValue() - getMinValue() = scale.
